item.description: This troubleshooting guide can be used to verify whether or not your camera can be used with tethering. This is done using the same (gphoto2) tool that darktable uses to interface with your camera. Before you start, you first need to find your camera port name. Usually the port “usb:” is sufficient and is therefore used in the following guide. ðŸ”—czy aparat jest wykrywany?
